name: Smiling Man
appearance_notes: Wide grin, staring intensely; gives a moving bundle

name: Business Lady
appearance_notes: Looking at watch, seems impatient; has no pulse

name: Faceless Man
appearance_notes: Has no face or eyes; rule is to serve him without looking at the face

name: Santa Claus
appearance_notes: Eyes look abnormal; carrying a bag that appears to contain a kidnapped person

name: The Dancer
appearance_notes: Does a weird dance only visible in the dark

name: Doppelganger
appearance_notes: Claims to have been at the shop before; appearance matches previous customers

name: Karate Man
appearance_notes: Practicing moves, looks normal, wearing a gi

name: Michael Myers
appearance_notes: Wearing a mask and holding a knife; breathing heavily
